## types.ReplaceAll type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type ReplaceAll<S extends string, From extends string, To extends string> = From extends "" ? S : S extends `${infer A}${From}${infer B}` ? `${A}${To}${ReplaceAll<B, From, To>}` : S;
```
